title: Turkey detains 44 people in raids targeting Kurdish militants: media
text:
Published By: Reuters - World news - Today 
ISTANBUL (Reuters) - Turkish police detained 44 people in Istanbul on Friday on suspicion of links with the Kurdistan Workers' Party (PKK) i...
